Antitumor benzothiazoles. 26.1 2-(3,4-dimethoxyphenyl)-5-fluorobenzothiazole (GW 610, NSC 721648), a simple fluorinated 2-arylbenzothiazole, shows potent and selective Inhibitory activity against lung, colon, and breast cancer cell lines. J Med Chem 2006; 49: 179– 85. 16392802
